attributes.action: bring back capital punishment for Child Murderers
attributes.additional_details:
Bring Back the death penalty for convicted child killers that have been proven beyond all doubt that they are guilty or by there own admission as they are a drain on the public purse and we the public should have a right to say how we spend our money and should not have to pay the £40,000 each year to keep the people in prison that kill our children and destroy  there's and our future.
We want justice for our children now.
